subject: Discrimination
Football
Homosexuality
Free Agents (Sports)
Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
lead_paragraph: Chris Kluwe, a punter for the Minnesota Vikings for eight seasons, wrote a first-person article alleging that team officials asked him to stop speaking about gay rights.
snippet: Chris Kluwe, a punter for the Minnesota Vikings for eight seasons, wrote a first-person article alleging that team officials asked him to stop speaking about gay rights.
